tspan.tspan: Prerequisites
Obtain and install the font family ITC Eras Std.
Details
The color wheel is copied from rt-logo.svg and a glow filter is added
to each segment and the wheel as a whole.
"Raw": font ITC Eras Ultra-Bold, 60 pt, -3 px letter spacing
"Therapee": font ITC Eras Medium, 60 pt, +1,5 pt letter spacing
Version (big number): ITC Eras Bold, 58 pt, skewed -3°
Version (period + small number): ITC Eras Bold, 34 pt, skewed -3°
Release-type: ITC Eras Bold, 16 pt, skewed -3°
Publishing
1. To prepare a splash screen for deployment, select all text and
choose
Path > Object to Path.
2. Change release type text to whatever is required, or hide the layer
"Release type" entirely.
3. Remove this text field.
. Save as "splash.svg" into "./rtdata/images/svg".
RawTherapee splash screen design 1.5 (March 2022)
www.rawtherapee.com
